contacts.name: Dr. Edward
contacts.signature: Unconsciousness is the language of the Big Other.

122410000.text: Greetings, esteemed {F#Miss}{M#Mr.} {NICKNAME}. I've heard that you've assisted Randolph with data collection. On behalf of myself, I would like to express my most sincere gratitude.

122410001.text: I believe Randolph has rewarded you accordingly, but this is also a part of my gratitude and sincerity. I hope you'll be satisfied.

122410002.text: Thanks to your work, I've already submitted the proposal to The Family for review and recorded your name in the assistant's column.

122410003.text: Finally, please allow me to express my deepest gratitude for your assistance with the store!
